name: Objectives
description: Infested areas are overrun by unwelcome life: vermin, spores, parasites, or hungry things that have made the place their nest. The original purpose of the area is still visible beneath the crawling, pulsing intrusion, but whatever lives here now is winning the slow war for the space.

tableData.result: Harvest the queen from the swarm
Burn out every nest and burrow
Recover relic buried beneath chittering
Lure the infestation into rival domain
Capture a living specimen for study
Poison the brood without scarred survivors
Seal every entrance before nightfall
Smuggle infected host past temple guards
Cleanse the shrine without angering spirits
Track the source beneath pulsing roots
Feed the hive to gain its favor
Rescue cocooned prisoners before hatching
Sabotage the fumigation to spare parasites
Steal the egg clutch untouched
Negotiate truce with the nesting horror
Bind the swarm as unwilling guardians
Plant a cursed seed among larvae
Mark the safest path through vermin
Silence the choral buzzing forever
Awaken the slumbering broodmother below
Shift infestation into your own flesh
Test unproven cure on helpless villagers
Smother the tunnels in sacred smoke
Trace carrier spreading worms through caravans
Hide evidence of spreading moldblight
Defend the hive from holy fire
Shatter the broodmind directing all pests
Deliver bait body to hungry spawn
Map every vein of creeping fungus
Provoke swarm to devour your enemies
Free the host-body from invasive spirit
Corrupt the well with clutch of leeches
Sift through maggot-pit for lost heirloom
Infect yourself to earn hive trust
Erect sanctum amid writhing infestation
Swap the broodmother with crafted decoy
Erase the last untainted corner
Preserve a fragment of living rot
Investigate voices whispering from termite walls
Turn all crawling things against their king
Barter safe passage with dripping tendrils
Redirect sewer swarm toward besieging army
Document each species for forbidden bestiary
Isolate a pure strain of corruption
Collapse the lair on gestating young
Plant listening charms among clustered eggs
Test whether the hive remembers your name
Ensure nothing escapes when fire comes
ACTION + THEME
ROLL TWICE

name: Atmosphere

tableData.result: Air thick with chittering whispers
Ceiling drips larvae instead of water
Floorboards pulse, riddled with unseen grubs
Mildew breathes slowly against the walls
Cobweb veils sag under twitching egg-sacs
Every shadow crawls with patient hunger
Rotten beams seethe with gnawing mandibles
Spores hang like dust, tasting of iron
Sour reek of nesting, musk and decay
Walls bulge where colonies knot and swell
Soft crunch underfoot betrays countless shells
Murmuring wings hum behind cracked plaster
Faint dust storms from every fresh scratch
Holes honeycomb the stone, softly weeping
Ceiling rustles like leaves, but wetter
Stale air buzzes with trapped bodies
Fungus blooms glow, feeding on memories
Thin trails of droppings form sigils
Chewed tapestries sag, alive with fleas
Lamp flames bow beneath unseen drafts
Every surface slick with crawling mildew
A thousand eyes glint in crevices
Slow, wet chewing somewhere behind you
Pipes rattle as something migrates within
Moss carpets quiver when stepped upon
Strange husks line the corners like trophies
The stench of nesting drowns all thought
Walls whisper as termites rearrange them
Shredded insulation writhes with pale worms
Dust motes reveal wriggling shapes midair
Dripping slime threads stitch room together
A low, shared heartbeat fills the hall
Roaches pour from keyholes like smoke
Ceiling beams sag under hidden brood
Mushrooms fan across portraits, devouring faces
Rats stare boldly, refusing to scatter
Every scratch on stone seeps insects
Once-ornate carvings now nests of clacking
Faint itch crawls beneath your skin
Buzzing rises whenever the room quiets
Maggot clusters throb in broken furniture
Wet straw bedding twitches with tiny lives
Thick cobwebs hum with trapped beating
Fur and feathers mat in glistening drifts
The air tastes of moldy breath
Soft bodies plop into puddles unseen
Doorframes groan as burrowers widen them
Every breath risks swallowing something alive
